name: Neighbor's Catastrophe
description:
You take control of the dog of the house, but when your owner is not at home, your neighbor's cat comes to make everything a total mess, breaking stuff and scattering the pieces all over the place. You have to find all the pieces and bring them together to reassemble them, and then place them back where they belong before your owner returns.

This game was a collaborative effort for the Global Game Jam 2020, made by a group of video game enthusiasts at the offices of Etermax, Argentina. The theme of the jam was "Repair".

Link to the global game jam page: https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/neighbors--catastrophe-1
